name: Synth Blockout
description:
Play the classic breakout game with the Synthwave Cyberpunk feel! Destroy blocks and rack up points to progress.

Play challenging extra levels made by players.

Controls
  • Move your mouse to control your paddle left and right across the screen
  • Press left click to launch your ball from your paddle and start destroying some blocks
Credits

WaveShaper and Carpenter Brut for music

MsKillerBee and Lucifim for extra levels

Various Artists for the backgrounds
